pageTitle: Havven | A decentralised payment network & stablecoin
pageDescription: Havvenâ€™s dual token system reduces price volatility, enabling everyday cryptocurrency purchases with a stable medium of exchange.

teamMembers.title: Founder
teamMembers.bio: Before launching Havven, Kain built the largest cryptocurrency payment platform in Australia, with tens of millions in transaction volume.

teamMembers.title: CTO
teamMembers.bio: Justin is a former Director of Engineering at MongoDB and has significant experience designing and deploying high availability systems at scale.

teamMembers.title: VP Partnerships
teamMembers.bio: Jordan has extensive experience in sales and business development in online payments, he structured numerous enterprise deals while at Paypal.

teamMembers.title: Senior Architect
teamMembers.bio: Clinton has 18 years experience in software engineering and is a former Architect Lead at JPMorgan Chase in trading technology.

teamMembers.title: Head of Product
teamMembers.bio: Charlie has a background in senior product management in both emerging and developed markets. He has managed several international launches for products with millions of users.

teamMembers.title: VP Operations
teamMembers.bio: Mikael has worked in director-level positions at Unibet and MyLotto24, focusing on corporate strategy and marketing/sales.

teamMembers.title: Communications Manager
teamMembers.bio: Garth graduated in Communications from the University of Sydney and has experience managing a national payments network.

teamMembers.title: Designer
teamMembers.bio: Matt is a freelance Product Designer, aiming to bring great UX and design to decentralised applications.
